*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Austin, August 18, 1832. Fears that abandonment of Tenoxtitlan by Colonel Ruiz will expose his settlement to Indians, who are threatening.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-18-1832">18 August 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*It appears that the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants *location_mentioned*above here*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* are all in confusion and I am vary much afraid unless some Incouragement is given to them they will not Remain. The affair of the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*killing *person_mentioned*Reed */person_mentioned*has alarmed them vary much, and *person_mentioned*Ruis */person_mentioned*will Leave the *location_mentioned*garreson */location_mentioned*in five days as I am informed and unless there is something done I hear the *person_mentioned*Setlers */person_mentioned*above there will all Leave about that time and in this being the Case we should become a *location_mentioned*Frontier*/location_mentioned*—- *person_mentioned*Smith */person_mentioned*is coming over and perhaps you could Recommend some plan to them to prevent there Breaking up If you can satisfy them and Keep them there I should be vary glad*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Williams*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*appears to be Troublesome to the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants */person_mentioned*above and they Look upon him to be a vary dangerous man. I vary much fear that *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*is a vary Bad and Troublesome man and particularly at this time he is now sent down a *person_mentioned*prisoner */person_mentioned*you will be able to Learn from the documents all about this for I have not Enquired into the particulars If you can doo anything to satisfy the people above there It wood be a vary good thing to Keep them from Breaking up your sincerly etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J P Coles*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin */person_mentioned*Town of *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
